website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Haniger - Casspi is a training shoe that fulfilled the needs of the consumers during everyday walks, workouts, and casual use. They lauded it for its comfortable build, an easy-to-wear strap closure, and fashionable design. While some have praised its true-to-size measurement, others have complained about the tight and narrow fit.  Despite the footwear’s shortcomings, it was still deemed a high-performing and versatile trainer by the users.
pros: A majority of consumers marveled at the comfort that the Skechers Haniger - Casspi provided
Plenty of reviewers were impressed by its true-to-size measurement
Many wearers approved of the hook-and-loop style of the closure, which made it easy for them to slip the trainer on and off
Numerous users adored the stylish aesthetics of the shoe
The footwear was appropriate for long walks, casual use, and workouts, according to multiple purchasers
A few buyers marveled at the great quality of the materials used and the construction of the product
Some shoppers thought that this pair of workout shoes had good value for its price
Several individuals complimented its strong grip even on wet and slippery surfaces
A smattering of the footgear owners were pleased with the adequate Memory Foam cushioning
People with foot conditions appreciated that the trainer was roomy enough to accommodate injuries and deformities
cons: Scores of critics maligned the tight and narrow fit
The Memory Foam wore down easily especially with frequent use, based on a few complaints

customer_reviews.title: We have been having trouble with fit and comfort and have had to return other shoes like these. He says that these Skechers fit so ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Skechers for my husband who has medical conditions that affect his feet. We have been having trouble with fit and comfort and have had to return other shoes like these. He says that these Skechers fit so well and are very comfortable. He likes them so well that I purchased him another pair. Great Shoes!!! We have never had any problems with fit and comfort with any Skechers I purchased for either men or women.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON THORPE

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the same size Skechers I have purchased previously ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same size Skechers I have purchased previously and while the foot fit it seemed tighter than my other Skechers. But the biggest issue was that the straps were too short by 1 inch when I tried to close them over my feet. I returned them yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Watchdog

customer_reviews.title: Size 13? not in the USA, they aren't!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because at a size 13 W, they were supposedly two sizes too large. My feet have a tendency to swell, and when they do, I have trouble getting shoes on. Normally, I wear a US size 11 EE. I tried to fit these this week when my feet were NOT swollen and I couldn't get them on. If these are size 13W, they are the smallest size 13 shoes I've ever seen! I need to return them.
customer_reviews.author: George M. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, somewhat uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected, but the velcro straps are far too short. Also, there's a strange cut-out on the inner side of the shoe near the ankle that seems to be cut very low. It makes the shoe feel like it's going to slip off your heel all the time. They're not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes !
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! They are super comfortable . He's a paramedic so he's on his feel a lot . His other shows were making his feet hurt and achy . These shoes feel good his whole shift and he works 12 hour shifts . Very nice comfy shoes and not to mention he doesn't have to tie them . That's another plus !
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: nice sneaker shoes
customer_reviews.text: These sketcher shoes are perfect and comfortable to wear. They are a combination of stylish and attractive and convenient to put on and wear foot ware . I definitely picked some good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cherian

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes and they fit as expected but the "memory" inserts make the foot a little close to the top of the shoe and after a while they feel tight but getting better as they are worn more.l
customer_reviews.author: El guyvacho

customer_reviews.title: Good Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. This is my first pair of Sketchers. I've been wearing Reeboks or New Balance for years. The shoes look good and are comfortable. The quality seems to be as good or better than the shoes I normally wear but will know more about the durability in the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: H. Tripp

customer_reviews.title: I've had similar products to this one from Skechers and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had similar products to this one from Skechers and this one runs a bit on the small size or my feet are growing...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cristofono

customer_reviews.title: I love velcro!
customer_reviews.text: I love velcro.... but it is getting increasingly more difficult to find a good pair of walking shoes. So thanks for this!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The velcro strap is perfect. Very comfortable on my feet, i have used them at the gym several times.
customer_reviews.author: KYDave

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Skechers Haniger Cassipi Sneaker is comfortable enough for exercise and handsome enough for more dressy use. I only wish it was available in brown or some other colors besides black and whites.
customer_reviews.author: Jimsoar

customer_reviews.title: Just about right
customer_reviews.text: Fits right ,breaths right. Work in a wet environment and they stay dry until they split and it's time for a new pair !

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these shoes, wears them indoors and out. Fit okay.
customer_reviews.author: Margi

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: My father loves how comfortable and light these Sketchers sneakers are! Another great feature of this shoe is the velcro top which makes it easy to put on and off.

customer_reviews.title: The "perfect walking sneaker"
customer_reviews.text: I always thought there was a better walking sneaker out there for me. " I can't wait to put them on every day". I'll be buying a second pair before the end of 2017. Thank you SKETCHERS.
customer_reviews.author: jim donahue

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: These didn't really hold up as very long. I'm just going to stick with buying my son New Balance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: T. harden

customer_reviews.title: These are well built and comfortable. No squeezing of the toes
customer_reviews.text: Incredible how difficult it is to find white Velcro sneakers for a man. These are well built and comfortable. No squeezing of the toes. Important stuff right there.
customer_reviews.author: DianneM

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time purchasing this sneakers, comfortable, easy to get on & easy closure.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: One of the best shoes at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. And so easy to get on and off. This sneaker witj thr cushion insole is a Winner

customer_reviews.title: This shoe was not wide enough for my husband. ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was not wide enough for my husband. I had to return them & I had to pay for shipping for having to return these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This is a great  way shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this shoe feels on my feet
customer_reviews.author: aldognumber1

customer_reviews.title: All Leather and strong Velcro closure
customer_reviews.text: hard to find decent Shoes with Velcro type closures. Had always liked Sketchers before, and these gave me another reason. Plus they seem to wear better than the cheapies found in most big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Faivre

customer_reviews.title: ... took a few days of breaking in to become comfortable, but felt great for about two and half ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at first because these took a few days of breaking in to become comfortable, but felt great for about two and half months and grip well even on wet floors. Unfortunately, the memory foam has begun to wear away already and the areas where it has done so can be clearly felt while walking. For light amounts of use, this is a solid shoe for hook-and-loop fans, but if you plan to wear them every day, be aware that they may not last. They also get hot faster than most sneakers I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the "memory foam" is great. Third pair I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and happy
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and don't hurt my feet like the other brand I was wearing. I now can walk around comfortably again.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Not Perfect, Normal Quality
customer_reviews.text: NIce product for everyday use and rain. Cheaper than the store.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Per Amazon, 11.5 2E was not available, their recommendation was 12D. That fit well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic shoes1 very comfortable and lots of support. I also like the rubber sole - better than composite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes them but has not wanted to wear them since it has been raining.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: Walked for the last 2 days at least 2miles per day and they were great.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great however the size is smaller I should have gotten one size up.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Velcro mens shoes are hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Velcro shoe are hard to find. My husband only has use of one arm, these shoes are easy for him to put on and they look great too!!!

customer_reviews.title: ... should have ordered 3e instead of 4 e but great
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered 3e instead of 4 e but great shoe

customer_reviews.text: had to return item I ordered the wrong size for my father... will make another purchase of the rights asap

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought my size and first time on initially a little tight, but after walking around for 10 minutes they adjusted to my feet and felt very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the shoes especially them not having shoe strings and says they are comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Velcrow closing.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Velcro instead of laces. End time buying this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Exactly. What I was expecting and was very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe...very comfortable fits right and looks pretty good to
customer_reviews.author: Donald C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy slip ons with Velcro are great for quick on and offs!
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft comfortable fit. They are wide enough for my flat feet.

customer_reviews.title: Very small.
customer_reviews.text: They are very narrow. I ordered 1 size larger and they still didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Bentz

customer_reviews.title: The comfort I expected is not in these shoes. ...
customer_reviews.text: The comfort I expected is not in these shoes. My old shoes same size 12d give me more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I thought Sketchers quit making the velcro closure sneaker and was pleased to find it again, although this is not . I love the convenience of velcro and the comfort of the memory foam insole. For me this is a great shoe. It is perhaps 1/2 size smaller than its designated US size, and has a different trim than my old model, but is every bit as comfortable and supporting.
customer_reviews.author: Francis I. Hodgkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit not quite as good as I had hoped, otherwise pleased
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Richard Gardner

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i was expecting a softer shoes the sides are hard and confy i am very disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: tongue slides into toe of shoe unless you hold it and pull before putting on. Size is more than a half-size smaller than in chart. Like everything else made today, it's designed as a One-Size-Fits-Many. Back in the day, shoes were all made in the US and sales people were trained to fit the shoe to your feet. This generic shoe and those like it are made for a dollar or less and sold for ridiculous markups.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for my 90 year old father!
customer_reviews.text: And he loves them! The Velcro makes it easier for him to get them off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Haniger Casspi Training Sneaker,Black,US 9.5 W
product_meta.description: Instant sporty training style and comfort comes in the SKECHERS Haniger - Casspi shoe. Smooth leather and synthetic upper in a two strap front athletic sporty training sneaker with stitching, overlay and perforation detail. Memory Foam insole, shock absorbing midsole, durable rubber outsole.
feature_bullets: Two strap front athletic sporty training sneaker design
Memory Foam full length cushioned comfort insole
Supportive shock absorbing lighter weight midsole design
Flexible rubber durable high traction outsole
